original_text: When Azariah the chief priest and all the other priests looked at him, they saw that he had leprosy on his forehead, so they hurried him out. Indeed, he himself was eager to leave, because the Lord had afflicted him.
korean_text: 대제사장 아사랴와 모든 제사장이 왕의 이마에 나병이 생겼음을 보고 성전에서 급히 쫓아내고 여호와께서 치시므로 왕도 속히 나가니라

sentences.original_text: and all the other priests looked at him
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 다른 모든 제사장들이 그를 보았을 때

sentences.original_text: they saw that he had leprosy

sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 그들은 그를 서둘러 밖으로 내보냈다

sentences.original_text: Indeed, he himself was eager to leave
sentences.korean_translation: 실로 그 자신도 떠나기를 간절히 원했다

sentences.original_text: because the Lord had afflicted him
